title: Ekko: Seconds Music
body: I really like the Music in Ekko: Seconds and I want to know what it is. I really can't be bothered asking in youtube (but I'm sure there's gonna be at least one here) cause of smart ass comments like "Darude: Sandstorm" and all the unoriginal knock offs. If someone could help me out by sending me a link that'd be sweet as.

replies.body:
https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/ekko-seconds 
And it is not Darude: Sandstorm :D {{champion:268}} this is the real Sandstorm master :D
most likely created by riot so i dont think you will be able to find it anywhere but in the video. :/ sorry mate
